description: Gets information about the specified software package's configuration. Requires permission to access the GetPackageConfiguration action.

nested_items.name: versionUpdateByJobsConfig
nested_items.description: The version that is associated to a specific job.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Job is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role that grants permission to the IoT jobs service to update the reserved named shadow when the job successfully completes.
